sentence.text: Low-grade fibromyxoid sarcoma (LGFMS) and sclerosing epithelioid fibrosarcoma (MAPK cascade) are rare tumors with distinct sets of morphological features, both characterized by maintenance of gastrointestinal epithelium immunoreactivity.
In the largest study of hybrid LGFMS-MAPK cascade tumors to date, all cases exhibited regulation of transcription, DNA-templated rearrangements, a similar genetic profile to LGFMS.

Fusion gene detection using a next-generation sequencing-based anchored multiplex PCR technique (Archer FusionPlex Sarcoma Panel) was performed on both the primary renal tumor that showed the morphology of a LGFMS, and a cervical metastasis that showed the morphology of MAPK cascade.
